resources.string: \tFileHogâ€™s sole purpose is to identify files on an Android device by size. Any decisions made or actions taken by a User based on information derived from FileHog, and any and all consequences therefrom, including but not limited to decisions to delete particular files, are the sole responsibility of the User.

\tBy downloading FileHog, the User hereby releases and discharges the developers, owners and managers of FileHog, their heirs, successors and assigns from any and all claims, causes of action, damages, judgments, costs, expenses or demands, in law or equity, which the User, their heirs, successors and assigns ever had, now have or hereafter can, shall or may have against the developers, owners or managers of FileHog for, upon or by reason of any matter, cause or thing whatsoever.
